title: The Journey: Moving from Data Products to Intelligence
abstract: Data oriented products are yesterday's products. Today, customers require easy to use, intelligent products that mashup data from multiple sources and deliver insights that are actionable. The journey from data products, to intelligent products requires investment, organizational change, new technologies, and new practices. Isaac will walk through the journey he led at McGraw-Hill Construction and BusinessWeek. From Construction, he'll describe and demonstrate three new products, two upgraded product lines, and several new capabilities that resulted from the data to intelligence transformation.
